page.title: 10Horse Riding.
page.content: Horse riding is a favourite{pastime}in and around Fifield. There are several {stables}as well as Horse Rangers. I do not have a pony of my own so I ride at stables in Fifield Road. On Sundays when I go,there are about 50 riders including a disabled boy.There are horses and ponies for us to ride.We use many of the{lanes and bridlepaths} in the locality.As well as riding the ponies we learn how to groom them and clean out the stables.We sometimes hold{gymkhanas}at which we can win rosettes.My friend has a pony of her own but it is not kept at the stables where I ride.He is stabled at a yard where there are 10 other ponies.She goes every day to see him except on Tuesdays. She also exercises him along the bridleways around Fifield and Holyport. She likes to take him to the stream to splash in the water.
